translations: adj.微弱的，无力的；虚弱的；薄弱的（feeble 的变形）

sentences.sentence: Grandmother has been getting feebler lately.
My grandfather is a lot feebler than when I last saw him.
sentences.translation: 我的爷爷比我上次见他的时候虚弱了许多。

sentences.sentence: Its economy is strained; witness the ever feebler dollar.
sentences.translation: 经济停滞不前，美元的虚弱就是明证。
